message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $9,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you consider this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not comfortable with $9,500. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $10,750.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,750. Can you consider this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11,000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I think $9,000 is a fair price for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm sorry, Bob, but $9,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more serious concession and offer it to you for $11,250.
I appreciate your concessions, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $8,500. This is my final offer.
